WORK EXPERIENCE

Senior Engineer - Quantity Surveying Sobha Ltd, India
Nov '15 - Till
Sobha Lifestyle II Legacy 16 Villas - Bangalore, India:

o

Preparations scrutinizing certifying and processing of contractors running and final account bills.

Processing required materials for project through  ERP according to its execution stage  every

As a Quantity surveyor, experience was on minimizing daily labor engagement (NMR) by arriving

Finalizing Detailed Estimate considering all parameters and ensuring the cost to be within the
